speech:
Ayurveda recommends several remedies for managing loose motions. Common suggestions include:
Banana: Easily digestible, helps firm stools.
Pomegranate: Astringent properties may help control diarrhea.
Ginger: Anti-inflammatory, aids digestion. Boil ginger in water, drink the decoction.
Curry Leaves: Boil leaves in water, consume for relief.
Cumin and Coriander Powder: Mix with honey, consume.
Buttermilk: Aids digestion, provides relief.
Isabgol (Psyllium Husk): Helps bulk up stools.
